results.title: The Big mill
results.creator_credit: Laurence Henson, Jack Holmes and Templar Film Studios
results.brief_description: The Big Mill is a steel strip mill at Motherwell, outside Glasgow. The film follows the processes of making, testing and rolling hot steel slabs and sheeting, destined for use in every branch of modern life.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Laurence Henson, Jack Holmes and Templar Film Studios
results.description: The Big Mill is a steel strip mill at Motherwell, outside Glasgow. The film follows the processes of making, testing and rolling hot steel slabs and sheeting, destined for use in every branch of modern life.

results.title: The Big island [Italian version]
results.creator_credit: Frank Bagnall and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description: The aim of this film is to show an international audience within a limited time span some attractive aspects of Australian life. Representing a brisk and exciting place and creating a mood of a country on the move. Cinematography by Keith Gow and Don McAlpine. Music by George Dreyfus. (Awards: AFI Travel Award 1970)
results.creator_credit_for_label: Frank Bagnall and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.description: The aim of this film is to show an international audience within a limited time span some attractive aspects of Australian life. results.title: The Big gull: Karoro: New Zealand's black-backed gull
results.creator_credit: Grant Foster, Derek Wright and New Zealand National Film Unit
results.brief_description: The New Zealand black-backed gull is one of 44 species that has adapted its natural way of life, to benefit from the wasteful habits of man. With naturalist Sir Robert Falla.

results.title: The Big green caterpillar. - 2nd ed.
results.brief_description: Uses close-up photography to show the development of the caterpillar from the egg to the pupa and then to the butterfly stage. Narrated by Jill Taggart. Suitable for primary years prep-6.

results.title: The Big fellow
results.creator_credit: Michel Pearce, Kip Porteous and Australian Broadcasting Commission
results.brief_description: Reconstructs the political career of J.T. Lang, Premier of New South Wales in 1925-1927 and 1930-1932, using contemporary film and stills and the recollections of some of the people most involved. Narrated by Allan Fraser. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: The Big day
results.creator_credit: Chris Fitchett and Audio Visual Workshop
results.brief_description: Suggests that one is wise to plan years ahead financially and otherwise, to be ready for retirement when the time comes. Cast includes Bill Kelly, Jennifer Hearne and Trevor Kilgour. Photographer: John Ruane.
